titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to abolish the electoral college and to provide for the direct popular election of the President and Vice President of the United States.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S234)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/8/2009--Introduced.
Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the direct popular election of the President and the Vice President. (Abolishes the Electoral College.)
